Yes, Ardabil is known for its stunning natural scenery and offers a range of outdoor activities. Some popular hiking and outdoor spots near Ardabil include:

1. Sabalan Mountain: This is the third-highest volcano in Iran, and the highest mountain in northwest Iran. There are several hiking trails, both beginner and advanced, leading to the summit. Hiking to the peak of Sabalan is a popular activity for tourists visiting Ardabil. 2. Neor Lake: A beautiful lake at the base of Sabalan Mountain, surrounded by mountains and green forests. It's a great spot for hiking, camping and fishing. 3. Meshkin Shahr County: A beautiful historical county surrounded by mountains and rivers. It offers many hiking options, including Oskoo Kohan hiking trail, Farahzad Valley, and Shirvan Gorge. 4. Gorazbon Waterfall: A beautiful waterfall located in the scenic countryside of Ardabil, surrounded by forests and hills. The area around the waterfall is perfect for hiking, relaxation and picnicking. 5. Sareyn: A beautiful spa town located in the foothills of Sabalan Mountain, famous for its hot water springs and beautiful mountain scenery. It offers several hiking trails and outdoor activities. I hope this helps you plan your outdoor activities in Ardabil!
